azure_shared_access_name.title: Share Access Name
azure_shared_access_name.description: The Event Hubs SAS key name.

azure_shared_access_key.title: Share Access Key
azure_shared_access_key.description: The key for the Event Hubs SAS key name.

azure_blob_account_name.title: Azure Storage Blob Account Name
azure_blob_account_name.description: The name of the Storage Blob account.

azure_blob_access_key.title: Azure Storage Blob Access Key
azure_blob_access_key.description: The key for the Azure Storage Blob service that is associated with the Storage Blob account name.

azure_blob_container_name.title: Azure Storage Blob Container Name
azure_blob_container_name.description: The name of the Storage Blob container.
